metadata.title: CVE-2022-32891 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
The issue was addressed with improved UI handling. This issue is fixed inSafari 16, tvOS 16, watchOS 9, iOS 16. Visiting a website that framesmalicious content may lead to UI spoofing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32891` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.36.6-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.36.6-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.36.6-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.36.6-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.36.6-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.36.6-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.36.6-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.36.6-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.36.6-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.36.6-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.36.6-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.36.6-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.36.6-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.36.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.36.6-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
